description.who: Software engineering startup focused on the intersection of social behavior and the internet for individuals and corporations.
description.what: Full-stack AI application that has raised over $500,000 in funding and is used by thousands. Frontend built in React.js, Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, HTML. Backend built in Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, managed by GCP (formerly AWS). Uses AI hosted on project Parrot (privately owned small language model) and public LLM. Personas collected via project Marmot (privately owned dataset AI researcher).
description.learned: Learned how to sell and partner with companies, hire and manage employees, and raise money as CEO.

description.who: Section in the Ford Chemical Engineering building on MIT's campus that focuses on control theory and applied mathematical modeling of chemical engineering.
description.what: Formulated simulations of bilinear chemical reactions, two-tank systems, and monticlonal antibody purification for vaccine manufacturing involving PDEs using Julia, MATLAB, and Python.
description.learned: Learned to apply mathematics via control theory and ML frameworks to find unknown parameters and predict phyiscal reactions for optimization.

description.who: The Sanchez-Rivera laboratory is focused primarily on epithelial cell carcinoma.
description.what: Showed that the 'EA' genetic knockout cell line grew without IL-3, suggesting the 'EA' knockout to be a cancerous gene by performing experiments on Ba/F3 dependent cancer cells.
description.learned: Mouse Trained, PPE Trained, Hazardous Laboratory Trained

description.who: Stock Solutions is an SEO-optimization company for local businesses.
description.what: Built a website tokenization application using Java, JavaFX, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for templates to be filled using a public LLM to optimize for SEO.
description.learned: Learned to further develop a business using software engineering, manage projects, and communicate with clients.

description.who: The Mighty Mussels are a minor league baseball team in the Florida State League.
description.what: Prepared food for the team, cleaned the locker rooms, uniforms, and cleats for the players, and oversaw a smooth transition for visiting players and fans.
description.learned: Taught me values of organization and cooperation. Prepared food for the team, cleaned the locker rooms and uniforms for the players, and oversaw a smooth transition for visiting players and fans.
